title: Goggles!
creator_credit: Isa Wickenhagen, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Peter finds a pair of motorcycle goggles without lenses. He and Archie set off with their treasure but run into some big boys who demand the goggles. Suspense mounts as Peter and Archie, with the help of Peter’s loyal daschund, Willie, attempt to outwit the bullies. Based on the book by Ezra Jack Keats.
